event: Liu Bang establishes Han Dynasty after fall of Qin
commit_message: Initial commit: Han Dynasty established after Qin collapse

event: Liu Bang's successors consolidate power, reduce Qin harshness
commit_message: Release: Early Han consolidation and policy reforms

event: Reign of Emperor Wu (Wu Di) - expansion and Confucianism
commit_message: Major update: Han Empire reaches greatest extent, Confucianism state ideology

event: Zhang Qian's missions to Central Asia - beginning of Silk Road
commit_message: Feature: Diplomatic missions establish Silk Road trade

event: Cai Lun's improvement of papermaking technology
commit_message: Innovation: Paper technology significantly improved and standardized

event: Wang Mang's Xin Dynasty interrupts Han rule
commit_message: Breaking change: Theorist Wang Mang temporarily disrupts Han dynasty

event: Restoration of Han Dynasty as Eastern Han under Guangwu Di
commit_message: Recovery: Eastern Han established after Xin Dynasty collapse

event: Ban Chao's campaigns reestablish Han control over Central Asia
commit_message: Feature: Military expansion reestablishes Silk Road control

event: Zhang Heng invents the first seismograph
commit_message: Innovation: Seismograph invented for earthquake detection

event: Party protests - conflicts between eunuchs and scholar-officials
commit_message: Bug fix: Political factionalism weakens central authority

event: Yellow Turban Rebellion - major peasant uprising
commit_message: Critical: Massive rebellion devastates Han territories and authority

event: Cao Pi forces Emperor Xian to abdicate, ending Han Dynasty
commit_message: End of life: Han Dynasty officially ends, beginning of Three Kingdoms period
